aka: Becoming Male in the Middle Ages

director.name: 伊莎多拉·内维斯·马克斯 Isadora Neves Marques

this_title: Tornar-se um homem na Idade Média
trans_title: Becoming Male in the Middle Ages
introduction: Mirene and André are a heterosexual couple struggling with infertility issues. Carl and Vicente are a homosexual couple undergoing an experimental procedure in order to have a biological child. The film's classic cinematography contrasts with a science-fictionalised narrative, to deliver an utterly refreshing exploration of gender, reproduction, normativity, and the notion of family. A work that’s food for thought – like the lab-grown meat in its opening scene.
foreign_title: Tornar-se um homem na Idade Média
